title: Efficient Customs Clearance
description: In 2019, Albania had an average customs clearance time of just 1.1 days for exports, showcasing its efficiency in trade facilitation.

title: High Frequency of Tax Meetings
description: In 2019, 93.2% of firms in Albania reported having to visit or meet with tax officials, with an average of 5.7 meetings per affected firm.

title: Low Patent Applications by Nonresidents
description: In 2021, Albania recorded only 1 patent application by nonresidents, indicating limited foreign innovation activity.

title: Minimal Railway Goods Transport
description: Albania transported 25.1 million ton-km of goods via railways in 2021, reflecting a limited use of rail for freight.

title: Low Railway Passenger Usage
description: In 2021, only 0.812 million passenger-km were recorded on Albanian railways, highlighting low public transport usage.

title: Limited Family Planning Satisfaction
description: As of 2018, only 6% of married women in Albania had their demand for family planning satisfied by modern methods.

title: Minimal ICT Goods Imports
description: In 2022, ICT goods accounted for just 0.21% of Albania's total goods imports, indicating a low reliance on technology imports.
